head off.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to leave to go to another place
head off.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to prevent something from happening, especially something bad
head off.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The president intervened to head off the conflict.
head off.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to stop someone going somewhere by moving in front of them
head off.translation[0].definitions[2].e: Soldiers headed them off at the border.
head off.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to take action to prevent something bad from happening
head off.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The country needs to find oil in time to head off a serious energy crisis.
